reasoning: Reporting incidence of primary myelofibrosis (PMF), a specific subtype excluding secondary myelofibrosis. PMF incidence ~0.3-1.0 per 100k person-years, using midpoint of 0.6.
source: Mehta J et al. (2014). Epidemiology of myeloproliferative neoplasms in the United States. Leuk Lymphoma. 55(3):595-600
